name: Intruder Alert: Ixian Operations
description: Intruder Alert is an science-fiction RTS having 6 totally different factions. It contains a single-player campaign, local LAN multiplayer, simple single player games and special challenges like Tower Defense.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP or newer Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL support (FBO support, at least 4096*4096 textures) Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP or newer Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL support (FBO support, at least 4096*4096 textures) Storage: 900 MB available space

reviews.review_text: its a semi good game but srsly you need to work on the title screen its making me puke
One of the worst games i've ever played. The game is way too boring. I've played plenty of RTS game's and this one is one of the worst.
